verses.verse: Paul, <WG3972> a servant <WG1401> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> called <WG2822> to be an apostle, <WG652> separated <WG873> to the gospel <WG2098> of God, <WG2316>
(Which <WG3739> he had promised <WG4279> before <WG4279> by his prophets <WG4396> in the holy <WG40> scriptures, <WG1124>)

Concerning <WG4012> his Son <WG5207> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> our Lord, <WG2962> which <WG3588> was made <WG1096> of the seed <WG4690> of David <WG1138> according <WG2596> to the flesh; <WG4561>
And declared <WG3724> to be the Son <WG5207> of God <WG2316> with power, <WG1411> according <WG2596> to the spirit <WG4151> of holiness, <WG42> by the resurrection <WG386> from the dead: <WG3498>
By whom <WG3739> we have received <WG2983> grace <WG5485> and apostleship, <WG651> for obedience <WG5218> to the faith <WG4102> among <WG1722> all <WG3956> nations, <WG1484> for his name: <WG3686>
Among <WG1722> whom <WG3739> are you also <WG2532> the called <WG2822> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ: <WG5547>

To all <WG3956> that be in Rome, <WG4516> beloved <WG27> of God, <WG2316> called <WG2822> to be saints: <WG40> Grace <WG5485> to you and peace <WG1515> from God <WG2316> our Father, <WG3962> and the Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ. <WG5547>

First, <WG4412> I thank <WG2168> my God <WG2316> through <WG1223> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> for you all, <WG3956> that your <WG5216> faith <WG4102> is spoken <WG2605> of throughout <WG1722> the whole <WG3650> world. <WG2889>

For God <WG2316> is my witness, <WG3144> whom <WG3739> I serve <WG3000> with my spirit <WG4151> in the gospel <WG2098> of his Son, <WG5207> that without <WG89> ceasing <WG89> I make <WG4160> mention <WG3417> of you always <WG3842> in my prayers; <WG4335>

Making <WG1189> request, <WG1189> if <WG1513> by any <WG4458> means <WG4458> now <WG2235> at <WG4218> length <WG4218> I might have a prosperous <WG2137> journey <WG2137> by the will <WG2307> of God <WG2316> to come <WG2064> to you.
For I long <WG1971> to see <WG1492> you, that I may impart <WG3330> to you some <WG5100> spiritual <WG4152> gift, <WG5486> to the end <WG1519> you may be established; <WG4741>
That is, that I may be comforted <WG4837> together <WG4837> with you by the mutual <WG1722> <WG240> faith <WG4102> both <WG5037> of you and me.

Now <WG1161> I would <WG2309> not have you ignorant, <WG50> brothers, <WG80> that oftentimes <WG4178> I purposed <WG4388> to come <WG2064> to you, (but was let <WG2967> till now, <WG891> <WG1204>) that I might hav <WG2192>e som <WG5100>e frui <WG2590>t amon <WG1722>g you also, <WG2532> eve <WG2532>n as amon <WG1722>g othe <WG3062>r Gentiles. <WG1484>
I am <WG1510> debtor <WG3781> both <WG5037> to the Greeks, <WG1672> and to the Barbarians; <WG915> both <WG5037> to the wise, <WG4680> and to the unwise. <WG453>
So, <WG3779> as much <WG2596> as in me is, I am ready <WG4289> to preach <WG2097> the gospel <WG2097> to you that are at <WG1722> Rome <WG4516> also. <WG2532>

For I am not ashamed <WG1870> of the gospel <WG2098> of Christ: <WG5547> for it is the power <WG1411> of God <WG2316> to salvation <WG4991> to every <WG3956> one that believes; <WG4100> to the Jew <WG2453> first, <WG4412> and also <WG2532> to the Greek. <WG1672>

For therein <WG1722> <WG846> is the righteousness <WG1343> of God <WG2316> revealed <WG601> from faith <WG4102> to faith: <WG4102> as it is written, <WG1125> The just <WG1342> shall live <WG2198> by faith. <WG4102>

For the wrath <WG3709> of God <WG2316> is revealed <WG601> from heaven <WG3772> against <WG1909> all <WG3956> ungodliness <WG763> and unrighteousness <WG93> of men, <WG444> who <WG3588> hold <WG2722> the truth <WG225> in unrighteousness; <WG93>
Because <WG1360> that which may be known <WG1110> of God <WG2316> is manifest <WG5319> in them; for God <WG2316> has showed <WG5319> it to them.

For the invisible <WG517> things of him from the creation <WG2937> of the world <WG2889> are clearly <WG2529> seen, <WG2529> being understood <WG3539> by the things that are made, <WG4161> even his eternal <WG126> power <WG1411> and Godhead; <WG2305> so <WG1519> that they are without <WG379> excuse: <WG379>

Because <WG1360> that, when they knew <WG1097> God, <WG2316> they glorified <WG1392> him not as God, <WG2316> neither <WG2228> were thankful; <WG2168> but became <WG3154> vain <WG3154> in their imaginations, <WG1261> and their foolish <WG801> heart <WG2588> was darkened. <WG4654>
Professing <WG5335> themselves to be wise, <WG4680> they became <WG3471> fools, <WG3471>

And changed <WG236> the glory <WG1391> of the incorruptible <WG862> God <WG2316> into <WG1722> an image <WG1504> made <WG4161> like <WG3667> to corruptible <WG5349> man, <WG444> and to birds, <WG4071> and four footed <WG5074> beasts, <WG5074> and creeping <WG2062> things.

Why <WG1352> God <WG2316> also <WG2532> gave <WG3860> them up to uncleanness <WG167> through <WG1722> the lusts <WG1939> of their own hearts, <WG2588> to dishonor <WG818> their own bodies <WG4983> between <WG1722> themselves: <WG1438>

Who <WG3748> changed <WG3337> the truth <WG225> of God <WG2316> into <WG1722> a lie, <WG5579> and worshipped <WG4573> and served <WG3000> the creature <WG2937> more <WG3844> than <WG3844> the Creator, <WG2936> who <WG3739> is blessed <WG2128> for ever. <WG165> Amen. <WG281>

For this <WG5124> cause <WG1223> God <WG2316> gave <WG3860> them up to vile <WG819> affections: <WG3806> for even <WG5037> their women <WG2338> did change <WG3337> the natural <WG5446> use <WG5540> into <WG1519> that which is against <WG3844> nature: <WG5449>

And likewise <WG3668> also <WG2532> the men, <WG730> leaving <WG863> the natural <WG5446> use <WG5540> of the woman, <WG2338> burned <WG1572> in their lust <WG3715> one <WG240> toward <WG1519> another; <WG240> men <WG730> with men <WG730> working <WG2716> that which is unseemly, <WG808> and receiving <WG618> in themselves <WG1438> that recompense <WG489> of their error <WG4106> which <WG3739> was meet. <WG1163>

And even <WG2531> as they did not like <WG1381> to retain <WG2192> God <WG2316> in their knowledge, <WG1922> God <WG2316> gave <WG3860> them over <WG3860> to a reprobate <WG96> mind, <WG3563> to do <WG4160> those <WG3588> things which are not convenient; <WG2520>

Being filled <WG4137> with all <WG3956> unrighteousness, <WG93> fornication, <WG4202> wickedness, <WG4189> covetousness, <WG4124> maliciousness; <WG2549> full <WG3324> of envy, <WG5355> murder, <WG5408> debate, <WG2054> deceit, <WG1388> malignity; <WG2550> whisperers, <WG5588>
Backbiters, <WG2637> haters <WG2319> of God, <WG2319> despiteful, <WG5197> proud, <WG5244> boasters, <WG213> inventors <WG2182> of evil <WG2556> things, disobedient <WG545> to parents, <WG1118>
Without <WG801> understanding, <WG801> covenant breakers, <WG802> without <WG794> natural affection, <WG794> implacable, <WG786> unmerciful: <WG415>

Who <WG3748> knowing <WG1921> the judgment <WG1345> of God, <WG2316> that they which commit <WG4238> such <WG5108> things are worthy <WG514> of death, <WG2288> not only <WG3440> do the same, <WG846> but have <WG2192> pleasure <WG4909> in them that do <WG4238> them.
